Keith Bloskas‎Post Lady Lopes
February 18, 2018 at 2:50 PM ·

Gold trophies are a special thing! They are EARNED, not given. What a special journey for this team and group of seniors! They left behind their legacy as the first team in a LONG time to win a playoff game, put a gold basketball in the trophy case, and win 20 games in a season! Some of the hardest working kids I’ve ever been fortunate to coach! They will forever be remembered for adding HISTORY to Post High School.

Greatness is seen during the season, but is made during the offseason. Our Lady Lope JH and HS basketball teams combined for 70 wins this season! This is a direct result of our kids showing up to summer league and open gyms, and the parents who got them there! Champions do not become champions when they win the event, but in the hours, weeks, months, and years they spend preparing for it. The victorious performance itself is merely the demonstration of their championship character. Our seniors have done a tremendous job of laying the foundation, now who will step up and be a part of the next group of Lady Lope basketball success??? #ALLIN #teamavery
